Irish: Cad é an t-ainm atá ort?
English: What is your name? [What name is on you?]

Irish: Cad é an t-ainm atá ort féin?

English: My name is $NAME [$NAME is the name on me]

Irish: Cad é an sloinne atá ort?

English: Who's this? (more than one person) Who are these?
Who are they/those? (more than one person)
